item.title: Album
item.description: .notice{padding:18px;line-height:24px;margin-bottom:24px;border-radius:4px;color:#444;background:#e7f2fa}.notice p:last-child{margin-bottom:0}.notice-title{margin:-18px -18px 12px;padding:4px 18px;border-radius:4px 4px 0 0;font-weight:700;color:#fff;background:#6ab0de}.notice.warning .notice-title{background:rgba(217,83,79,.9)}.notice.warning{background:#fae2e2}.notice.info .notice-title{background:#f0b37e}.notice.info{background:#fff2db}.notice.note .notice-title{background:#6ab0de}.notice.note{background:#e7f2fA}.notice.tip .notice-title{background:rgba(92,184,92,.8)}.notice.tip{background:#e6f9e6}.icon-notice{display:inline-flex;align-self:center;margin-right:8px}.icon-notice img,.icon-notice svg{height:1em;width:1em;fill:currentColor}.icon-notice img,.icon-notice.baseline svg{top:0.125em;position:relative} Info 少侠，此处还在施工中!!

item.title: FriendShip
item.description: .myfriends { background-color: #fff; opacity: 0.9; } .myfriends a { color: black; } .myfriends p { display: none; } .friendurl { text-decoration: none !important; color: black; } .myfriend { width: 56px !important; height: 56px !important; border-radius: 50%; border: 1px solid #ddd; padding: 2px; box-shadow: 1px 1px 1px rgba(0,0,0, .15); margin-top: 14px !important; margin-left: 14px !important; background-color: #fff; } .frienddiv { height: 92px; margin-top: 10px; width: 100%; display: inline-block !important; }
